protocol_name: Manual dissection of the Schistosoma mansoni head and back end for transcriptomic analysis
protocol_name_html: Manual dissection of the Schistosoma mansoni head and back end for transcriptomic analysis
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3b","text":"This protocol describes how to prepare a 100x M2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"850pv","text":"1x M2 media could be created from the stock and supplemental stocks and trace metals could be added afterwards.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ck74l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lfp8","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jcgj","text":"Recipes for standard and alternative M2 for culturing freshwater cyanobacteria, such as Synechocystis sp. PCC 6803, in a co-culture togther with heterotrophic bacteria.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":88,"length":13,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5gqqr","text":"Media is usually not suitable for marine cyanobacteria.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iidf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9sjk8","text":"Slighly modified from: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e32q0","text":"Weiss, Taylor L., Eric J. Young, and Daniel C. Ducat. \"A synthetic,  light-driven consortium of cyanobacteria and heterotrophic bacteria  enables stable polyhydroxybutyrate production.\" Metabolic engineering 44 (2017): 236-245.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":186,"length":21,"style":"italic"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"5j91q","text":"Add CaCl2 2H2O (3.6 g \u00b7 L-1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":8,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":12,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":25,"length":2,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cfq2d","text":"If you do not have hydrated CaCl2, use 2.718 g CaCl2 (powder) for 1L of the stock.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":32,"length":2,"style":"sub"},{"offset":51,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"49o1o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dl612","text":"0.25 M Na2-EDTA stock: Dissolve\u00a02.32 g Na2-EDTA (powder) and fill the bottle up with MilliQ\u00a0(nuclease-free) water up to 25 mL. Afterwards, the pH was adjusted with diluted NaOH to pH = 8.0.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":9,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":41,"length":1,"style":"sub"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b2i6h","text":"","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3vvel","text":"K2HPO4 (82,3g\u00b7L-1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":15,"length":2,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"F3B88F90D15E11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674673,"previous_id":674672,"previous_guid":"93E1CD20D15E11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"davt7","text":"Add Citric acid (0.6 g \u00b7 L-1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":26,"length":2,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"912046B0D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674674,"previous_id":674673,"previous_guid":"F3B88F90D15E11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"1d6cn","text":"Add NaNO3 (17 g \u00b7 L-1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"95DD80A0D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674675,"previous_id":674674,"previous_guid":"912046B0D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"9g5cs","text":"Add MgSO4 \u00b7 7 H2O (7.49 g \u00b7 L-1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bgsct","text":"If you do not have  hydrated MgSO4, use 3.659 g MgSO4 (powder) for 1L of the stock.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"9B0DA0A0D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674676,"previous_id":674675,"previous_guid":"95DD80A0D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"3haas","text":"0.25 M Na2-EDTA, pH 8.0 (0.56 ml \u00b7 L-1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"offset":9,"length":1,"style":"sub"},{"offset":36,"length":2,"style":"sup"}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2mn3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"B766DC30D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674677,"previous_id":674676,"previous_guid":"9B0DA0A0D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"c9ud1","text":"Fill up with MiliQ water to one liter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"0AF368F0D16011E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674683,"previous_id":674677,"previous_guid":"B766DC30D15F11E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"bct10","text":"Mix the solution with a stir bar","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"186D6C10D16011E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674684,"previous_id":674683,"previous_guid":"0AF368F0D16011E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
steps.section: Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle

steps.data: {"blocks":[{"key":"2vmfi","text":"autoclave afterwards","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[],"guid":"2FB8DCB0D16011E88B9F9D4CF000E769","id":674685,"previous_id":674684,"previous_guid":"186D6C10D16011E88B9F9D4CF000E769","section":"Addition of ingredients for M2 in a 1 l bottle"}
